Title: Robbed a Stoner Blind
Plot: In the middle of a heat wave, Earl decides to cross number 26 off his list "Robbed a Stoner Blind." To accomplish this task Earl and Randy find Woody the stoner and must live an environmentally conscious life in the commune with Woody for a week.
GuestStars: Christian Slater,  Eve Sigall,  Michael Patrick McGill,  Steven Huey,  Jennifer Kenyon,  James Martin Kelly,  Sandy Brown
